placeholder.heading: Management reform plans for District government.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 47-395.2 1981 Ed. had been amended by § 52(j) of D.C. Law 12-264; however, effect was given to the repeal by Pub. L. 106-1.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 47-395.3 had been amended by § 52(k) of D.C. Law 12-264; however, effect was given to the repeal by Pub. L. 106-1.

Department heads report solely to Authority: Section 1604(f)(2)(B) of Pub. L. 105-34, 111 Stat. 1049, provided that notwithstanding § 11104(b)(3) of the Balanced Budget Act of 1997 (former paragraph (b)(3) of this section), in carrying out any of the management reform plans under such section, the head of a department of the government of the District of Columbia shall report solely to the District of Columbia Financial Responsibility and Management Assistance Authority.

placeholder.heading: Reform of powers and duties of department heads.

level.heading: Construction of Law Construction of Law 12-124
level.text: Section 301 of D.C. Law 12-124 provided, in part, that nothing in the act shall be construed as superseding the provisions of the National Capital Revitalization and Self-Government Improvement Act of 1997, approved Aug. 5, 1997 (P.L. 105-33; 111 Stat. 712), except that § 47-395.04(b)(3) is expressly superseded.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 47-395.4 had been amended by § 52(l) of D.C. Law 12-264; however, effect was given to the repeal by Pub. L. 106-1.

placeholder.heading: Powers of Financial Responsibility and Management Authority unaffected.
